body:
FYI we are also experiencing this issue on https://projects.blender.org (we are currently using version `1.24.3`).

This is fairly annoying, since it can very easily lead to losing info/ability to keep track of some PRs without any real way to notice it, besides being aware of the issue and adding yourself back to reviewers' list after the comment...

issue.title: Fix inputing review comment will remove reviewer
